name: TNN Bass Tournament of Champions
overview: Pick out your favorite spot, drop by the Pro Shop and gear up for TNN's Bass Tournament of Champions. It'll take more than luck to catch the big ones! Test your skills and patience as you sound out bass. Choose your lure and cast your line in an honest to goodness bass fishin' experience right in your living room! For secret tips and surprises, watch your favorite fishing shows on "TNN Outdoors".
